name: Dusk Diver-ASUS PACK
detailed_description:
ROG collaboration costume.
This content adds costume for the main character "Yang Yumo".
You can access it from the dressing room menu in the convenience store.
about_the_game:
ROG collaboration costume.
This content adds costume for the main character "Yang Yumo".
You can access it from the dressing room menu in the convenience store.
short_description: This content requires the base game https://store.steampowered.com/app/911220/Dusk_Diver/ on Steam in order to play.
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
